text:
Restaurant was not crowded during lunch time on Saturday.

Ordered 江湖辣子鸡. The chicken cubes were tasty and crispy, but too bad no peanuts were added.

麻辣烤鱼 was also good. Surprisingly the fish was not cooked throughly even after they deep fried. It's fine as it was cooked after we left it awhile inside the boiling soup. Will try their other dishes next round.

Worth the go if u ard Hillion BPP
better then one at interchange
Authentic Sichuan not crowded
Value for money good quality quantity
New place nice modern atmosphere
Place fast furious waitresses no smile
but friendly efficient water self service
Patrons nice lot too families included
Large place but can get crowded 6pm
Sichuanese says not hot or numb enough
Kudos no alkaline (hot additive) or too much MSG
All prices stated reasonable, drinks $3
Stir fry a little overdone but can see more
Passionate preparation then others
Seasoned staffs (another stall @ JE)
So no pain, clean neat place, crowd not
loud or rowdy too
Permanently Closed. Replaced by A Kitchen.
